capabilities.name: Vendor.CanRead
capabilities.description: Ability to list all vendors for the tenant.

capabilities.name: Vendor.CanReadById
capabilities.description: Ability to retrieve a single vendor by its ERP ID.

capabilities.name: VendorContact.CanReadById
capabilities.description: Ability to retrieve a single vendor contact by its ERP ID.

capabilities.name: VendorContact.CanListByVendor
capabilities.description: Ability to list contacts associated with a specific vendor.

capabilities.name: VendorContact.CanWrite
capabilities.description: Ability to create or update vendor contacts in the ERP.
